Reviews.Content: stay pleasant wished elevator carrying heavy suitcases wouldnt difficult hotel clean sometimes towels werent changed left shower female desk clerk helpful city maps location couple underground stations westfield shopping center natural history museum royal albert hall portobello road notting hill westminster major attractions

Reviews.Content: location recently renovated clean quiet courtyard bit tiny regarding internet pictures bigger ours decent breakfast hotel staff friendly helpful forgot mobile bedside drawer day phoning hotel cooperative lady reception care return properly

Reviews.Content: stayed night desperately looking hotel 10 hours arrival hotel walking distance 10 minutes paddington underground station bit expensive 90 gbp night hotel elevator offered following free breakfast wifi tv hair dryer tea kettle staff extremely friendly location nice street arose tea kettle dirty previous users recommend 60

Reviews.Title: “Good location, lacking other conveniences”

Reviews.Content: positives cleanliness free wifi convenient location negative standard regards fixtures fittings nice flat screen tv tuned shower heads didnt bracket mattress double replacing dips broken left repair botched little dont tend quality hotel lift narrow staircase bag noisy hotel hear traffic people outside people hotel fine looking crash pad decent location little cheaper chain hotels relaxing getaway family trip business travel location

Reviews.Content: front window air conditions placed mattress worn instead floor wood shaky bathroom fittings lot dust dirt bed clammy spots fungi directly beneath bed rusty water boiler bed toxic mousetrap highlight door stood evening maid forgot close bar breakfast reduced simple hotel highpriced youth hostel hotel improve customer relation management critical situations positive location near paddington station

Reviews.Title: “Clean and friendly but room a little on small side”
Reviews.Author: CMI28
Reviews.Content: hotel bright fresh recently staff polite friendly basement pretty suitcases mine near bed bit annoying underneath table beside bed otherwise wouldnt able walk clean bright modern decor coffee tea facilities cupboard putting clothes housed fridge handy bathroom lovely massive shower little struggle sliding door shower bit squeeze bed comfy clean wall opposite flat screen tv basement sometimes hear underground trains banging chairs feet underneath breakfast reception annoying meant hear people coming hours overall nice hotel basement

Reviews.Title: “better than a 4 star down the road”
Reviews.Author: jk2308
Reviews.Content: nice hotel brand 2 minutes paddington station staff helpful especially indian guy night shifts stayed western road 27 paddington liked closer tube nicer brighter size personal service breakfast simple toast croissant ham cheese jams fruits yoghurts cereals surprise coffee double espresso thats huge plus western filtered coffee
